text: The Good Earth is a 1937 American romantic drama movie directed by Sidney Franklin, Gustav Machatý and Victor Fleming. It was based on the 1931 novel of the same name by Pearl S. Buck and starring Paul Muni, Luise Rainer, Walter Connolly, Tilly Losch, Charley Grapewin, Jessie Ralph. It was nominated for 5 Oscars and won 2 Academy Awards in 1938. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1937 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Victor Fleming Category:Movies directed by Gustav Machatý Category:Movies directed by Sidney Franklin Category:Movies set in China
title: The Good Earth (movie)
